name: 2D Combo system prototype
description:
This is a demo of a physics based combo system

This system is the base of my future game, a rogue like/lite with fighting game mechanics. 

You can follow the journey here: https://twitter.com/CryzyStudio

Feedbacks are welcome!

Enjoy

--------------------

Gamepad recommanded

Gamepad layout:

Keyboard layout:

  • move: left / right arrow key
  • jump: up arrow key / space
  • dash : shift
  • light attack: S
  • heavy attack: D
  • Special1: A
  • Special2: F
  • Inventory: Escape
